title: Bitdeer mined 122.4 BTC this week, increasing its total bitcoin holdings to 2,141.1 BTC - Bitget
content:
ChainCatcher reported that bitcoin mining company Bitdeer posted on Twitter that its bitcoin holdings have risen to 2,141.1 BTC (pure holdings, excluding customer deposits). In addition, this week’s bitcoin mining output was 122.4 BTC, but 66.1 BTC were sold during the same period, resulting in a net increase of 56.4 BTC.

Disclaimer: The content of this article solely reflects the author's opinion and does not represent the platform in any capacity. This article is not intended to serve as a reference for making investment decisions.
